Posts.Content: Sus21 To say I am scared is an understatement has anyone on here had this surgery that can send me positive things that helped them through recovery thanks  Hi There , I had this surgery twice , yes first you feel awful and like a bit of pain but believe me it's a miracle of how quick your body recovers from this big op ,  hope all goes well today and if u have any more questions just ask  Tanja xx
Posts.Title: LD Flap mastectomy today
